title: Tree of Health Integrative Medicine
description: Tree of Health Integrative Medicine specializes in a holistic and proactive approach to health, with commitment to provide skilled and progressive care that is centered on the patient. We believe that each person is unique and complex, and we take time to listen in order to uncover the root cause of illness.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic medicine is a primary health care system with distinct emphasis on a holistic approach to health. Naturopathic physicians combine a number of modern, traditional, and scientific techniques to diagnose, treat, and prevent illness, and to maintain health. Naturopathic doctors are trained in a wide variety of natural therapies, some of which include botanical medicine, clinical nutrition, homeopathy, and physical medicine. They also support patients on prescription medications at different stages of their recovery and health maintenance. Please visit our [COVID-19](/covid-19/) page for important information related to our clinic operations.
